Don't cry because it's over, smile becau.Quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
Don't cry because it's over, smile becau.Author: Dr. Seuss

I'm selfish, impatient and a little inse.Quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
I'm selfish, impatient and a little inse.Author: Marilyn Monroe

There are only two ways to live your lif.Quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
There are only two ways to live your lif.Author: Albert Einstein

Insanity is doing the same thing, over a.Quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
Insanity is doing the same thing, over a.Author: Narcotics Anonymous
